name: getFlightAwareLoungeRecommendations
description: Get intelligent lounge recommendations based on specific flight information, including real-time flight status, terminal locations, and optimal timing for lounge visits.

flight_number.description: Flight number in format like 'AA123', 'DL456', etc.

departure_date.description: Departure date in YYYY-MM-DD format (local to departure airport)

user_id.description: User ID to retrieve membership and access information

preferences.description: Optional user preferences for lounge selection

quiet.description: Prefer quiet zones for work or rest

food.description: Prefer lounges with good food service

operational_suffix.description: Optional flight suffix like 'A' or 'B' for flight variants
